reviewText: These dvds were obviously made from tapes of the original series.  The sound is scratchy, when you can actually hear it, and both the picture and sound keep going up and down.  It was impossible for me to watch even 5 minutes of it.  Save your money until the series comes out remastered and re-digitalized.
The program material is one of my old time favorites. The quality of the picture was poor but perhaps that is do to the 1950's taping and one cannot do better.
